Posts.Content:
This is my first time here, and I found this site after searching the internet for answers. I was so glad to find it! 
I am 50 years old and there is no history of breast cancer in my immediate family. Last year after a routine mammogram I received a letter stating I needed further evaluation. I scheduled the 2nd mammogram and ultrasound per instructions. After the mammogram they told me I didn't need the ultrasound because everything was clear. I was so relieved!
This year I went for my yearly mammogram (on Monday, 10/31), and I received another letter in the mail stating the same as the year before. I have another mammogram and ultrasound scheduled for Monday morning. I am really scared. I want to believe everything will be okay again, but what are the chances of being called back for the second year in a row and nothing being wrong? I keep thinking "what if they missed something last year?" Has anyone else been called back two years in a row? 
Thanks in advance for the support and encouragement. 
Geddie
Posts.Title: 2nd year chances

Posts.Content:
Yes, the area is the same. Last year, however, they didn't even do the ultrasound because the call back mammo was okay. I wish I had insisted to do the US anyway. Maybe it will be okay again. 
GEDDIE
Posts.Title: 2nd year chances

Posts.Content:
Thanks for responding, Bev. It helps to talk to others. I thought I handled that first year call back relatively well, but I can't say that this time. I feel like I am being such baby about
 this when I know nothing for sure. I will check out the next thread. Thanks again.
Posts.Title: 2nd year chances

Posts.Content:
Mammo was fine. It was tissue overlap for the second year in a row. Thank you, God. Thank you, Bev, for being here to help others though! 
Geddie
Posts.Title: 2nd year chances

Posts.Content:
I just found out that my call back mammo was fine. Tissue over lapping was the problem. I was scared all weekend especially since this was the second year in a row for a call back. Hang in there. You have good chances for a great report! 
Geddie
Posts.Title: Mamogram call back for another one, scared
